channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Durbin Spreads Cartoonishly False Hoax About ICE Agents Tying Up Children
item.description: Sen. Dick Durbin, D-Ill., ranking member of the Senate Judiciary Committee, opened the oversight hearing of the Department of Justice (DOJ) pushing a ...

item.title: Time to Spring Trump’s Tariff Trap
item.description: As a condition of ending the shutdown, Democrats should curb the president’s tariff powers.

item.title: Trump threatens 'substantial' firings if shutdown continues: 'Jobs will never come back'
item.description: President Trump on Tuesday vowed to cut billions in federal programs and fire a 'substantial' number of workers if the government shutdown continues.

item.title: Exclusive: Pedophiles, Abusers Among Aliens Arrested By ICE While Dems Withhold Agents’ Paychecks
item.description: 'Our officers continue to risk their lives every day to arrest criminal illegal aliens despite not getting paid,' said DHS's Tricia McLaughlin.

item.title: Best border in 55 years: DHS nabs fewer than 240,000 illegal immigrants at southwest boundary
item.description: The Border Patrol has just completed its best fiscal year since 1970 when it comes to the southern border, where agents seized fewer than 240,000 peop...

item.title: Portland prosecutors drop charges against conservative journalist arrested during anti-ICE protests
item.description: Prosecutors in Portland, Oregon, have declined to charge a conservative journalist whose arrest while documenting protests outside of the city's immig...

item.title: National Guard Standoff Is a Recipe for More Political Conflict
item.description: The incentive structure here is all wrong.

item.title: Despite ‘No Evidence’ Of Arson, Democrats, Media Spew Lies Linking Trump To Judge’s House Fire
item.description: As of Tuesday, the Democrats and outlets parroting unsubstantiated claims that Trump somehow incited the disaster had yet to correct their framing.

item.title: The War Against Immigration Enforcement
item.description: Chicago residents have failed to do the one thing necessary to avoid National Guard deployment — let federal officers do their jobs.

item.title: Trump promises to straighten out Chicago's crime problem if Democratic leaders won't
item.description: President Trump on Tuesday promised that if Chicago leaders cannot get a handle on the city's crime problem, the federal government will take charge.

item.title: Why Colorado’s Counseling Censorship Should Lose at the Supreme Court
item.description: At least three aspects of the case should lead to free speech prevailing.

item.title: Supreme Court skeptical of Colorado's ban on conversion therapy for LGBTQ children

item.title: Colorado Gender Ideology Wages War on Religious Freedom
item.description: The Supreme Court has the opportunity to reaffirm that religious freedom is not conditional on ideological conformity.
